trans-unit.source: Represents a placeholder (bookmark) within an event stream.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en plassholder (bokmerke) i en hendelse dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: You can use the placeholder to mark a position and return to this position in a stream of events.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke plassholderen merke en posisjon og gå tilbake til denne plasseringen i en dataflyt av hendelser.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object can be obtained from an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord"></xref> object, in which case it corresponds to the position of that event record.
trans-unit.target: Kan hente en forekomst av dette objektet fra en <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord"> </xref> objektet, da det samsvarer med plasseringen av denne hendelsespost.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"> </xref> klassen fra den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>forekomster.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt som inneholder informasjonen som kreves for å serialisere den nye <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objekt som inneholder kilden for serialisert dataflyt som er knyttet til den nye <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt med data som kreves for å serialisere målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt med dataene som kreves for å serialisere målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet til å fylle ut med data.
